verses.text: Woe to the crown of pride , to the drunkards of Ephraim , whose glorious beauty \add is\add* a fading flower , which \add are\add* on the head of the fat valleys of them that are overcome with wine !\f + \fr 28.1 \ft overcome: Heb. broken\f*

Behold, the Lord hath a mighty and strong one , \add which\add* as a tempest of hail \add and\add* a destroying storm , as a flood of mighty waters overflowing , shall cast down to the earth with the hand.
The crown of pride , the drunkards of Ephraim , shall be trodden under feet :\f + \fr 28.3 \ft under…: Heb. with feet\f*

And the glorious beauty , which \add is\add* on the head of the fat valley , shall be a fading flower , \add and\add* as the hasty fruit before the summer ; which \add when\add* he that looketh upon it seeth , while it is yet in his hand he eateth it up.\f + \fr 28.4 \ft eateth: Heb. swalloweth\f* \p
¶ In that day shall the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts be for a crown of glory , and for a diadem of beauty , unto the residue of his people ,
And for a spirit of judgment to him that sitteth in judgment , and for strength to them that turn the battle to the gate. \p

¶ But they also have erred through wine , and through strong drink are out of the way ; the priest and the prophet have erred through strong drink , they are swallowed up of wine , they are out of the way through strong drink ; they err in vision , they stumble \add in\add* judgment.
For all tables are full of vomit \add and\add* filthiness , \add so that there is\add* no place \add clean\add*. \p

¶ Whom shall he teach knowledge ? and whom shall he make to understand doctrine ? \add them that are\add* weaned from the milk , \add and\add* drawn from the breasts.\f + \fr 28.9 \ft doctrine: Heb. the hearing?\f*
For precept \add must be\add* upon precept , precept upon precept ; line upon line , line upon line ; here a little , \add and\add* there a little :\f + \fr 28.10 \ft must be: or, hath been\f*
For with stammering lips and another tongue will he speak to this people.\f + \fr 28.11 \ft stammering…: Heb. stammerings of lip\f*\f + \fr 28.11 \ft will…: or, he hath spoken\f*
To whom he said , This \add is\add* the rest \add wherewith\add* ye may cause the weary to rest ; and this \add is\add* the refreshing : yet they would not hear.

But the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was unto them precept upon precept , precept upon precept ; line upon line , line upon line ; here a little , \add and\add* there a little ; that they might go , and fall backward , and be broken , and snared , and taken. \p
¶ Wherefore hear the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye scornful men , that rule this people which \add is\add* in Jerusalem.

Because ye have said , We have made a covenant with death , and with hell are we at agreement ; when the overflowing scourge shall pass through , it shall not come unto us: for we have made lies our refuge , and under falsehood have we hid ourselves: \p

¶ Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I lay in Zion for a foundation a stone , a tried stone , a precious corner \add stone\add*, a sure foundation : he that believeth shall not make haste.
Judgment also will I lay to the line , and righteousness to the plummet : and the hail shall sweep away the refuge of lies , and the waters shall overflow the hiding place. \p

¶ And your covenant with death shall be disannulled , and your agreement with hell shall not stand ; when the overflowing scourge shall pass through , then ye shall be trodden down by it.\f + \fr 28.18 \ft trodden…: Heb. a treading down to it\f*

From the time that it goeth forth it shall take you: for morning by morning shall it pass over , by day and by night : and it shall be a vexation only \add to\add* understand the report.\f + \fr 28.19 \ft to…: or, when he shall make you to understand doctrine\f*
For the bed is shorter than that \add a man\add* can stretch himself \add on it:\add* and the covering narrower than that he can wrap himself \add in it\add*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall rise up as \add in\add* mount Perazim , he shall be wroth as \add in\add* the valley of Gibeon , that he may do his work , his strange work ; and bring to pass his act , his strange act.
Now therefore be ye not mockers , lest your bands be made strong : for I have heard from the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of hosts a consumption , even determined upon the whole earth. \p
¶ Give ye ear , and hear my voice ; hearken , and hear my speech.
Doth the plowman plow all day to sow ? doth he open and break the clods of his ground ?

When he hath made plain the face thereof, doth he not cast abroad the fitches , and scatter the cummin , and cast in the principal wheat and the appointed barley and the rie in their place ?\f + \fr 28.25 \ft the principal…: or, the wheat in the principal place, and barley in the appointed place\f*\f + \fr 28.25 \ft rie: or, spelt\f*\f + \fr 28.25 \ft place: Heb. border?\f*
For his God doth instruct him to discretion , \add and\add* doth teach him.\f + \fr 28.26 \ft For…: or, And he bindeth it in such sort as his God doth teach him\f*
For the fitches are not threshed with a threshing instrument , neither is a cart wheel turned about upon the cummin ; but the fitches are beaten out with a staff , and the cummin with a rod.
Bread \add corn\add* is bruised ; because he will not ever be threshing it, nor break \add it with\add* the wheel of his cart , nor bruise it \add with\add* his horsemen.
This also cometh forth from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , \add which\add* is wonderful in counsel , \add and\add* excellent in working.
